article_title: Ex-Im Bank Survives Tea Party Attack, Girds For The Next One

article_metadata.author: John Brinkley

og.description: Given the certitude of a presidential veto, there's no chance that the bank's foes can kill it. But try they will, and for the next nine months business-friendly House Republicans will be inundated with pleas, and money, from business constituents who say that they’re out of the export business if the bank goes under.
